Text: chrs Gaz, u done a gr8 job with these, will you get us the TOWIE in marbella coming out next week sometime the 10th or 13th is the proposed screening time in uk. chrs mate...

No Worries guys :)

Luckily MIC and TOWIE have finished, with the exception of the one-off specials. I will post those when I am allowed to get back to work!!
